snippet: The western method of attempting to limit armaments has nothing to do with the moral disarmament of which Gandhi is the greatest living apostle.
lead_paragraph: The western method of attempting to limit armaments has nothing to do with the moral disarmament of which Gandhi is the greatest living apostle.

headline.main: Sept. 26, 1931: Gandhi and Disarmament in the Western World
headline.print_headline: Gandhi and Disarmament in the Western World

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
